TestCase.name: testCannotProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c, b + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], EXPR$2=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], EXPR$2=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

TestCase.name: testNestedProjectDisabled
TestCase.Resource: SELECT id, deepNested.nested1.name AS nestedName, nested.`value` AS nestedValue, deepNested.nested2.flag AS nestedFlag, deepNested.nested2.num AS nestedNum FROM NestedTable

LogicalProject(id=[$0], nestedName=[$1.nested1.name], nestedValue=[$2.value], nestedFlag=[$1.nested2.flag], nestedNum=[$1.nested2.num]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable]])

LogicalProject(id=[$0], nestedName=[$1.nested1.name], nestedValue=[$2.value], nestedFlag=[$1.nested2.flag], nestedNum=[$1.nested2.num]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, NestedTable, project=[id, deepNested, nested]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotProjectWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c, d, b + 1 FROM VirtualTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[+($0, 1)], EXPR$3=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2], d=[+($0, 1)], EXPR$3=[+($1, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithoutInputRef
TestCase.Resource: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MyTable
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalAggregate(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) +- LogicalProject($f0=[1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[]]])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, TRIM(c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), _UTF-16LE' ', $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[TRIM(FLAG(BOTH), _UTF-16LE' ', $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a, c]]])

TestCase.name: testProjectWithUdfWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, my_udf(d) FROM VirtualTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[my_udf(+($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], EXPR$1=[my_udf(+($0, 1))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, project=[a]]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleProjectWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM VirtualTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable]])
LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[+($0, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, project=[a]]])

TestCase.name: testSimpleProject
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, c FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, project=[a, c]]])
